languages.text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Orchestrated Firestorm{/g} and {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g}. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} и все его союзники, оружие которых позволяет совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаки по области{/g}, совершают атаки по области вместо одиночных атак во время Направленного шквала и Последнего рывка. Все союзники в этой области получают +35% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} мастера-тактика.

traits.locale_text: All allies, including the Tactician, that have a weapon capable of Area of Effect attacks, use Area of Effect attacks instead of a single strike to attack enemies as part of Directed Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% Armour until the end of the Tactician's next turn.

All allies, including the Tactician, that have a weapon capable of Area of Effect attacks, use Area of Effect attacks instead of a single strike to attack enemies as part of Directed Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% Armour until the end of the Tactician's next turn.

All allies, including the Tactician, that have a weapon capable of area of affect attacks use these area of fffect attacks instead of a single strike to attack enemies as part of Directed Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% Armour until the end of the Tactician's next turn.

All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} и все его союзники, оружие которых позволяет совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаки по области{/g}, совершают атаки по области вместо одиночных атак во время {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Направленного шквала{/g} и {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Последнего рывка{/g}. Все союзники в этой области получают +35% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} мастера-тактика.
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Orchestrated Firestorm{/g} and {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g}. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} и все его союзники, оружие которых позволяет совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаки по области{/g}, совершают атаки по области вместо одиночных атак во время {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Направленного шквала{/g} и {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Последнего рывка{/g}. Все союзники в этой области получают +35% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} мастера-тактика.

Тактик и все его союзники, оружие которых позволяет совершать атаки по области, совершают атаки по области вместо одиночных выстрелов во время Направленного шквала и Последнего рывка. Все союзники в этой области получают +35% к броне до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} тактика.

languages.text: {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}枪炮奏鸣{/g}与{g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}最终齐射{/g}期间，包括{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}在内，所有使用{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}武器的盟友，都可以使用范围攻击（而非单体攻击）来攻击敌人。区域内的所有盟友都会获得+35%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，效果持续至战术专家的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Orchestrated Firestorm{/g} and {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g}. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 枪炮奏鸣与最终齐射期间，包括{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}在内，所有使用{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}武器的盟友，都可以使用范围攻击（而非单体攻击）来攻击敌人。区域内的所有盟友都会获得+35%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，效果持续至战术专家的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

languages.text: Todos los aliados (incluido el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g}) que tengan un arma capaz de efectuar {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} usarán estos ataques de área en vez de lanzar ataques individuales para atacar a sus enemigos como parte de {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Tormenta de fuego coordinada{/g} y {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Salva final{/g}. Todos los aliados situados en la zona ganan un +35 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del maestro táctico.
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Orchestrated Firestorm{/g} and {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g}. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Todos los aliados (incluido el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g}) que tengan un arma capaz de efectuar {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} usarán estos ataques de área en vez de golpear una sola vez para atacar a sus enemigos como parte de Tormenta de fuego dirigida y Salva final. Todos los aliados situados en la zona ganan un +35 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del maestro táctico.

languages.text: Sämtliche Verbündeten, einschließlich des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikers{/g}, die mit ihren Waffen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} ausführen können, nutzen als Teil von {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Geplanter Feuersturm{/g} und {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Letzte Salve{/g} diese Flächenangriffe anstatt eines Einzelangriffs. Alle Verbündeten innerhalb der Zone erhalten +35 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Meistertaktikers.
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Orchestrated Firestorm{/g} and {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g}. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Sämtliche Verbündeten, einschließlich des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikers{/g}, die mit ihren Waffen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} anstatt Einzelangriffe ausführen können, nutzen als Teil von Gezielter Feuersturm und Letzte Salve diese Flächenangriffe. Alle Verbündeten innerhalb der Zone erhalten +35 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Meistertaktikers.

languages.text: Tous les alliés, y compris le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g}, qui disposent d'une arme capable d'effectuer des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} utilisent ces attaques de zone plutôt qu'une attaque ponctuelle contre les ennemis dans le cadre de {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Tempête de feu dirigée{/g} et de {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Dernière salve{/g}. Tous les alliés présents dans la zone bénéficient de +35 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du maître tacticien.
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Orchestrated Firestorm{/g} and {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g}. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tous les alliés, y compris le Tacticien, qui disposent d'une arme capable d'effectuer des attaques de zone utilisent ces {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} plutôt qu'une frappe ponctuelle pour attaquer les ennemis dans le cadre de Tempête de Feu Dirigée et de Dernière Salve. Tous les alliés présents dans la zone bénéficient de +35 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Tacticien.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}が可能な武器を持つ、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}を含むすべての味方は、うねるファイアストームと最後の斉射での攻撃時に、単発攻撃ではなく範囲攻撃を使用する。範囲内のすべての味方は、戦略の達人の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+35%される。
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}が可能な武器を持つ、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}を含むすべての味方は、うねるファイアストームと最後の斉射での攻撃時に、単発攻撃ではなく範囲攻撃を使用する。範囲内のすべての味方は、戦略の達人の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+35%される。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyen{/g} de dâhil olmak üzere {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} yapabilen silaha sahip tüm dost birimler, {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Organize Ateşseli{/g} ve {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Son Salvo{/g} kabiliyetlerinin parçası olarak tek saldırı yerine alan saldırısı gerçekleştirir. Bölgenin içindeki tüm dost birimler, +%35 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} kazanırlar. Bu etki, Usta Taktisyen'in bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sonlanana dek sürer.
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Orchestrated Firestorm{/g} and {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g}. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
